descriptions.title: ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" IPS 180HZ FHD 1ms Gaming Monitor
descriptions.details: This ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" IPS 180HZ FHD Gaming Monitor offers a 27-inch IPS display that produces sharp and clear images at a resolution of 1920x1080. It has a high refresh rate of 180Hz and a rapid reaction time of 1 ms, ensuring smooth and responsive gameplay. The display offers Adaptive-Sync technology, which syncs the monitor's refresh rate with the frame rate of your GPU, preventing screen tearing and stuttering. The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A Gaming Monitor also includes a number of gaming features that allow you to customize your display settings and improve your performance. For example, you may alter numerous settings by selecting one of six preset GameVisual modes, using the GamePlus tools, or using the DisplayWidget Center program. Also, there are built-in speakers, an earphone connector, a tilt-adjustable stand, a VESA wall mount option, and a Kensington lock hole on the monitor. The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A is an excellent alternative for gamers looking for a high-quality monitor in a sleek and durable design.

descriptions.title: IPS Panel
descriptions.details: The IPS panel of ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" Gaming Monitor has 178°/178° viewing angles, so you may enjoy the same visual quality from any position. Also, the panel includes a non-glare surface, which decreases eye strain and reflections.

descriptions.title: 180Hz Refresh Rate
descriptions.details: The 180Hz refresh rate allows you to play fast-paced games without latency or motion blur. You may also use the DisplayPort or HDMI connectors to alter the refresh rate according on your preferences and the game's needs on ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" Gaming Monitor.

descriptions.title: 1ms Response Time
descriptions.details: With ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" Gaming Monitor the 1ms reaction time reduces ghosting and smearing, improving the clarity and sharpness of moving objects. You may also use the Extreme Low Motion Blur (ELMB) or ELMB Sync capabilities to minimize motion blur even more and sync with Adaptive-Sync.

descriptions.title: Adaptive-Sync Technology
descriptions.details: The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" Gaming Monitor offers Adaptive-Sync technology, which synchronizes the refresh rate of the monitor with the frame rate of the GPU. This eliminates screen tearing and stuttering, both of which can spoil your game experience. NVIDIA G-SYNC and AMD FreeSync technologies are supported by the display.

descriptions.title: GameVisual and GamePlus
descriptions.details: The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" IPS 180HZ FHD 1ms Gaming Monitor contains a number of gaming features that will improve your experience. GameVisual has six predefined display settings for various scenarios such as FPS, RTS, RPG, and so on. GamePlus includes essential utilities such as a crosshair, timer, and FPS counter.

descriptions.title: DisplayWidget Center
descriptions.details: The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" Gaming Monitor comes with DisplayWidget Center software, which lets you to modify numerous settings and functions with your mouse and keyboard. The settings may also be accessed via the OSD menu and the joystick on the monitor.

descriptions.title: Ergonomic Design
descriptions.details: The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" IPS 180HZ FHD 1ms Gaming Monitor includes a tilt-adjustable stand that allows you to select the best viewing position for you. It also comes with a VESA-compatible wall mount for more versatility. For added protection, the monitor incorporates a Kensington lock slot.

descriptions.title: Built-in Speakers
descriptions.details: The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279Q3A 27" IPS 180HZ FHD Gaming Monitor comes with two built-in speakers that produce clear and strong sound. You may also use the earphone port on the display to connect your headphones or external speakers.

descriptions.title: LG 32GQ950-B 32 Inch UltraGear 4K UHD 144Hz 1ms G-Sync Nano IPS Gaming Monitor
descriptions.details: The LG 32GQ950-B is a 32-inch 4K UHD gaming monitor with a fast refresh rate of 144 Hz. It's part of LG's UltraGear gaming monitor lineup and one of the first on the market to support HDMI 2.1 bandwidth, making it an excellent choice for next-generation console gamers. It provides an excellent gaming experience with low input lag, quick response time, and support for NVIDIA and FreeSync Premium Pro variable refresh rate technology. The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch gaming monitor also comes with FreeSync Premium Pro technology. It reduces screen tearing and stuttering and allows gamers to experience seamless, fluid movement in high-resolution, fast-paced games. The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch UltraGear Monitor's color accuracy and consistency can be improved by using hardware calibration via the LG Calibration Studio.

descriptions.title: UHD 4K (3840x2160) Resolution
descriptions.details: The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch supports UHD 4K video and variable refresh rates up to 120 Hz via HDMI 2.1. This provides console gamers with an immersive gaming experience. The 32GQ950-B 32-inch gaming monitor has a refresh rate of up to 144 Hz (O/C 160 Hz). But, when using an HDMI 2.1 cable, it supports 4K and a variable refresh rate of 120 Hz.

descriptions.title: Nano IPS Display
descriptions.details: The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch UltraGear 4K UHD 144Hz G-Sync Nano IPS Gaming Monitor has Nano IPS technology. The Nano-IPS technology enhances color expression. This technology has a broad color gamut that covers 98 percent of the digital gaming industry's standard DCI-P3 color space and 135 percent of sRGB, making it ideal for expert-level creative work like high-resolution image retouching with large amounts of color information.

descriptions.title: Ultra-fast 1ms(GtG)
descriptions.details: The LG 32GQ950-B nano IPS gaming monitor has a response time of 1 ms (gray to gray). The 1 ms response time reduces ghosting and allows you to experience a whole new level of gaming performance.

descriptions.title: VESA Display Stream Compression Technology
descriptions.details: The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch Nano IPS gaming monitor features VESA Display Stream Compression Technology and supports 4K hi-resolution. The high-speed refresh rate of 144Hz (O/C 160Hz) with 1ms (GtG) response time, HDR, and G-Sync compatibility, as well as covering 10 bits of color with a single DisplayPort connection, reduces visual loss..

descriptions.title: Customized Modes for Any Game
descriptions.details: The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch Nano IPS gaming monitor offers customized modes for any game. Gamers can tailor their experience by choosing between gamer, FPS, and RTS modes. The settings can be adjusted and optimized for any game.

descriptions.title: ASUS ROG Swift 360Hz PG259QN 24.5" 1ms G-Sync FHD Gaming Monitor
descriptions.details: ROG Swift 360 Hz PG259QN is the perfect gaming monitor for esports and fast-paced action games. This FHD (1920 x 1080) display features a Fast IPS panel with up to a 360 Hz refresh rate, 1 ms gray-to-gray (GTG) response time and NVIDIA G-SYNC processor for silky-smooth gameplay and ultra-realistic visuals. And of course, it has that distinct ROG design that lets everyone know that this is no ordinary gaming monitor.

descriptions.title: ULTRA-RESPONSIVE PERFORMANCE- NVIDIA G-SYNC PROCESSOR
descriptions.details: NVIDIA G-SYNC Processor gives you more of what you want in a gaming experience. Experience incredibly smooth, tear-free gameplay at refresh rates up to 360 Hz, ultra-low motion blur. ASUS Fast IPS panel technology allows liquid crystal elements in the display to turn on and off up to four times faster than conventional IPS panels, giving ROG Swift 360 Hz PG259QN a 1 ms GTG response time and little-to-no smearing or motion blur.

descriptions.title: INTELLIGENT COOLING SYSTEM FOR 12% LOWER TEMPERATURES
descriptions.details: The custom heatsink found in ROG Swift 360Hz PG259QN offers more surface area for heat exchange compared to those found in other g-sync displays, ensuring efficient cooling during marathon gaming sessions. ROG Swift 360Hz PG259QN uses convection currents to generate airflow within the monitor, with hot air exiting via the rear top vents and cool air drawn in via underside vents. This fanless cooling system ensures that operates silently and stays maintenance-free.

descriptions.title: SILKLY-SMOOTH AND CRYSTAL-CLEAR GAEMPLAY- NVIDIA Ultra Low Motion Blur
descriptions.details: NVIDIA Ultra Low Motion Blur technology uses backlight strobing to reduce motion blur to give you super smooth moving visuals. HDR technology delivers visuals with a wider color range and higher contrast than traditional monitors for more realistic visuals.

descriptions.title: ASUS ProArt Display PA328QV 31.5" WQHD Professional Monitor
descriptions.details: ProArt Display PA328QV is a 31.5-inch monitor designed to satisfy the needs of creative professionals, from photo and video editing to graphic design. ProArt Display PA328QV is factory calibrated and Calman Verified to deliver superb color accuracy (∆E < 2). It also provides industry-standard 100% sRGB / 100% Rec. 709 color space coverage. With ASUS-exclusive features, such as ProArt Preset and ProArt Palette with six-axis color, black-level and brightness adjustments, PA328QV makes it easy to achieve the exact look you desire quickly, easily and precisely.

descriptions.title: Bring out the true beauty of your pictures
descriptions.details: The ProArt display delivers industry-standard 100% sRGB and 100% Rec. 709 color gamut for rich, vivid reproduction that ensures every detail of your photos is clear and lifelike.

descriptions.title: High color fidelity for truly expressive hues
descriptions.details: Revel in pure, expressive hues thanks to accurate, true-to-life color reproduction. ProArt displays achieve ∆E < 2, so your images are accurately reproduced on screen – allowing you to see exactly how your work is going to look when it's finished.

descriptions.title: True color, right out of the box
descriptions.details: Color professionals rely on color-accurate displays to ensure that their creations look exactly as intended. ProArt Display PA328QV is factory calibrated and Calman Verified to guarantee industry-leading color accuracy. Every ProArt display undergoes stringent, meticulous testing to ensure smoother color gradation. Consumer or pro, you're assured color-accurate viewing and content-creation experiences.

descriptions.title: Personalized editing experience
descriptions.details: ASUS ProArt Palette lets you customize your display via a wide range of parameters, including color hue, temperature, and gamma adjustments – all easily accessed via intuitive on-screen menus. There are also two-point grayscale sliders for all six colors, providing greater color-adjustment flexibility than many competing monitors. ProArt Palette empowers you to produce quickly and consistently, and makes it easy to keep your color management in check.

descriptions.title: Rich Connectivity
descriptions.details: ProArt Display PA328QV offers rich connectivity with DisplayPort 1.2, dual HDMI (v1.4) ports, and a built-in USB hub, so it's easy to hook up to a wide variety of devices and enjoy ultra-fast transfer speeds with external storage – catering to every content-creation demand.

descriptions.title: Dell UltraSharp U2422HE 24 inch FHD Type-C IPS Monitor
descriptions.details: The Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE monitor has a 1920 x 1080 resolution for detailed visuals. It has a 21.5" IPS panel with a 16:9 aspect ratio. With only one cable, you may dock your laptop for Type-C input and receive data, video, and up to 65W of power delivery. Four 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports on the integrated USB hub allow wired peripherals to be connected. In addition to DisplayPort input and output for daisy chaining monitors, the U2422HE monitor features an HDMI input. Moreover, window partition presets, auto restoration and hassle-free display setting configuration let you multitask with ease. The 21.5-inch Full HD Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE monitor has a brightness of 250 nits, a broad 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angle, and Low-blue-light screen technology to reduce eye strain. Accurate and crisp colors may be seen on the display thanks to its 1000:1 static contrast ratio and 16.7 million colors. Increase performance by overrating the 14 ms response time to 5 ms and benefit from the Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE has 60 Hz refresh rate for fluid video playback. To find your ideal angle, you can spin, tilt, swivel, or modify the monitor's height. Additionally, third-party mounts and stands that are compatible with this monitor and are sold separately can be attached using the included 100 x 100mm VESA mounting pattern.

descriptions.title: Productive at Every Level
descriptions.details: Easy Arrange of Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE Monitor enhances your multitasking skills by enabling you to quickly and effortlessly tile numerous apps across one or more screens with 38 pre-set window divisions and the customization of up to five windows.

descriptions.title: Designed for multitasking
descriptions.details: Attach the monitor to two PC sources. When a second PC is attached, our clever Auto KVM feature recognizes it and smoothly transfers control. One keyboard and mouse can be used to control two PCs by utilizing the KVM (keyboard, video, and mouse) feature.

descriptions.title: Broad Connectivity
descriptions.details: There are numerous interfaces for connecting to various devices on the U2422HE FHD monitor, such as DisplayPort, HDMI connectors. product_name: ASUS TUF Gaming VG259QM 24.5inch FHD 280Hz G-SYNC Overclockable Monitor

features.Features: Free Sync, Flicker Free, Low Blue Light, G-Sync

Dimension: Phys. Dimension with Stand(WxHxD): 563 x (356~486) x 211 mm
Phys. Dimension without Stand (WxHxD): 563x 329 x 52 mm

descriptions.title: ASUS TUF Gaming VG259QM 24.5inch FHD 280Hz G-SYNC Overclockable Monitor
descriptions.details: Astonishing overclockable 280Hz refresh rate means the display is almost twice as fast as conventional 144 Hz monitors. You'll experience amazingly fluid gaming visuals, giving you the upper hand in first-person shooters, racing, real-time strategy, and sports titles. Fast IPS Display allows the display's liquid crystal elements to switch up to 4X faster than conventional IPS panels for improved response. With a 1 ms gray-to-gray response time, smearing and motion blur are virtually eliminated. This display also delivers superior images with outstanding colors thanks to 72% NTSC color gamut and an astounding 1,000:1 contrast ratio. Wide 178-degree viewing angles ensure minimal distortion and color shift even when you're viewing from extreme positions. With variable-refresh-rate (VRR) technology enabled by default, you're assured seamless, tear-free gaming experiences from your NVIDIA GeForce GTX 10 or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 20-series graphics card. HDR technology delivers a wider color range and higher contrast than traditional monitors. The brightest whites and the darkest blacks bring out details like never before. The display is also capable of 400 cd/m2, meeting the stringent requirements for DisplayHDR 400 certification. ASUS Dynamic Shadow Boost technology automatically clarifies dark areas of the game world with optimizing other areas, improving overall viewing while also making it easier to spot enemies hidden in shaded areas of the map. The ASUS-exclusive, integrated GamePlus hotkey offers in-game enhancements that help you get more out of your game. This function is co-developed with input from pro gamers, allowing them to practice and improve their gaming skills. ASUS GameVisual Technology has seven pre-set display modes to optimize visuals for different types of content. This unique feature can be easily accessed through a hotkey or the on-screen display settings menu. Flicker-Free technology reduces flicker to minimize eyestrain for improved comfort when you're embroiled in long gaming sessions. ASUS Ultra-Low Blue Light technology reduces the amount of potentially harmful blue light emitted by the display. Four different filter settings are available to control the amount of blue light reduction. Extensive connectivity options, including DisplayPort1.2, HDMI 2.0x2, and Earphone Jack offer support for wide array of multimedia devices. With an ergonomically-designed stand, it provides tilt, swivel, pivot, and height adjustments so you can easily find your ideal viewing position. The display is also VESA-compatible for wall mounting.

descriptions.title: Xiaomi RMMNT27NU 27" 4K Professional Monitor
descriptions.details: The Xiaomi RMMNT27NU Monitor has a 27-inch display with thin bezels. It has a resolution of 3840 x 2160 pixels, a color gamut of 1.07 billion, and a brightness of 400 cd/m2. Pantone color certified, Delta E1 color accuracy covers 99% of DCI-P3 99% and 100% sRGB color space. It also features a dedicated key for switching between many professional settings for various circumstances such as CG, CAD, and so on.

descriptions.title: 4K ultra-high resolution
descriptions.details: The Xiaomi RMMNT27NU 27" Professional Monitor features 4K ultra-high resolution revealing exquisitely realistic detail in every corner of the scene. Images on this IPS display with a resolution of 3840 x 2160 are stunningly clear. With parts of the image zoomed in several times, you can control the details of your work more precisely when processing images.

descriptions.title: Cinematic wide color gamut
descriptions.details: The Xiaomi RMMNT27NU 27" 4K Professional Monitor has vibrant colors with 99% DCI-P3 and Adobe RGB. The outstanding color display brings richer color gradation, regarded as a great tool for professional designers and video creators for image retouching and color matching, and demonstrating their creativity.

descriptions.title: Versatile Type-C port & multiple ports
descriptions.details: The Xiaomi RMMNT27NU 27" 4K Professional Display benefits from high-speed data transfer via Type-C, and the multi-functional Type-C connector allows for a 'one-cable connection' between your laptop and monitor. It can not only transmit audio and video signals and data at fast speeds but can also charge your computer at the same time, with a maximum power of 90W*, leaving you with a neat and organized workstation.

descriptions.title: Adjustments from Various Angles to Make You Feel at Ease While Working
descriptions.details: The Xiaomi RMMNT27NU 27" 4K Professional Monitor comes with a multi-functional stand that can be adjusted in all directions, including vertically, horizontally, and slanted. There is also a new OSD design that allows the menu interface to rotate with the screen.

descriptions.title: All of Your Content Requirements Can Be Met, Whether Portrait or Landscape
descriptions.details: You can switch between landscape mode and portrait mode at any time to adapt to the display of different typeset content, improving creators' work efficiency.

descriptions.title: Lightweight for Easy Transportation
descriptions.details: A series of designs, including hidden heat dissipation and cable storage, interpret technological elegance while remaining simple. The narrow frame design fills the entire screen with vibrant colors, making your work the center of attention at all times. The Xiaomi RMMNT27NU 27" 4K Professional Monitor comes with a 2-year warranty (1-year parts and 1-year service warranty).

descriptions.title: GIGABYTE GS27Q 27 inch QHD 2K 165Hz Gaming Monitor
descriptions.details: The GIGABYTE GS27Q monitor offers an elegantly simple design that minimizes distractions, a 2560 x 1440 resolution that decreases motion blur, and a standard refresh rate of 165 Hz that can be upgraded to 170 Hz. In addition, AMD Free Sync Premium technology, when used with compatible graphics cards, removes screen tearing and stuttering in fast action scenarios. Additionally, GS27Q 27 inch IPS QHD Gaming Monitor supports HDR which provides realistic scenery while exploring broad areas. it has a curved Features such as a Black Equalizer and GIGABYTE Game Assist let you outsmart opponents.

descriptions.title: Fast In Graphics
descriptions.details: The GIGABYTE GS27Q 27 inch monitor panel features a 1ms reaction time and a refresh rate of 165 Hz (or 170 Hz overclocked), which significantly reduces motion blur to provide fluid action scenes. Two further features are a static contrast ratio of 1000:1 and brightness of 300 nits.

descriptions.title: Rich Color Effect and Perfect Viewing Angle
descriptions.details: The HDR-ready 27 inch SS IPS panel of the GIGABYTE GS27Q Monitor, which covers 105% of the sRGB gamut and offers up to 16.7 million colors, enhances bright highlights and deep shadows in pictures and movies. Technologies with less blue light and less flickering aid to alleviate eyestrain during extended viewing periods.

descriptions.title: Gaming Features
descriptions.details: The onscreen timer on the GIGABYTE GS27Q 27 inch IPS Gaming Monitor allows you to keep track of the amount of time you've spent gaming. By adding and configuring a crosshair, you can improve your accuracy when playing shooting games. With less motion blur, the aim stabilizer improves targeting and visual clarity.
